alert.note: Alert for Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 8:01PM MST until December 28 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST TUESDAY ABOVE 4500 FEET... * WHAT...Periods of snow increasing overnight and continuing on Tuesday. Total snow accumulations generally ranging from 3 to 6 inches, with lesser amounts below 5000 feet and locally higher amounts above 7000 feet. Southwest winds gusting to near 40 mph at times. * WHERE...Areas above 4500 feet near Fredonia, Grand Canyon, Jacob Lake and North Rim. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Slippery and snow covered roads could led to very difficult travel. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility at times. Additional snow forecast from 7 PM Today to 5 PM Tuesday: Fredonia 1 to 2 inches Grand Canyon 2 to 4 inches Jacob Lake 2 to 4 inches North Rim 4 to 8 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
